name: OSX Snow Leopard
character_details: Snow Leopard-tan is depicted as an pale-looking young woman, with long, wavy light blue hair and eyes, very light skin, freckles and light gray leopard ears and tail. She usually wears a blue, grey and white outfit consisting of a sleeveless split-front dress, high collar, a ruffled white skirt and long gloves and leggings. Completing this look are boots and a hair bow. Personality-wise, Snow Leopard-tan is mature, intelligent and tends to attract less trouble than her predecessor, Leopard, in large part due to the fact that she doesn't time-travel extensively like Leopard does. She's affable like her OSX sisters but tends to be less social. While her powers remain yet-unknown, it has been speculated that they may involve the ability to control snow.
